message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and features that can revolutionize your operations or personal life. Given its exceptional quality and unique value proposition, we believe it's worth more than $1500000. Considering this, let me propose a starting offer of $2000000 for the product. I look forward to discussing how this investment could significantly impact your business or endeavors.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and the value you attribute to the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1500000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
